Quotes.quote: Think lightly of yourself and deeply of the world.
Quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

Quotes.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
Quotes.author: Lao Tzu

Quotes.quote: Awakening is not changing who you are, but discarding who you are not.
Quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

Quotes.quote: Spirituality: the art of keeping your internal fire alive.
Quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

Quotes.quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the now the primary focus of your life.
Quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

Quotes.quote: Fools laugh at others. Wisdom laughs at itself.
Quotes.author: Osho

Quotes.quote: The Best Way To Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
Quotes.author: Walt Disney

Quotes.quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
Quotes.author: Will Rogers

Quotes.quote: If You Are Working On Something That You Really Care About, You Don’t Have To Be Pushed. The Vision Pulls You.
Quotes.author: Steve Jobs

Quotes.quote: We Generate Fears While We Sit. We Overcome Them By Action.
Quotes.author: Dr. Henry Link

Quotes.quote: Security is mostly a superstition. Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
Quotes.author: Helen Keller

Quotes.quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
Quotes.author: Albert Einstein

Quotes.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
Quotes.author: Albert Einstein

Quotes.quote: My favorite machine at the gym is the vending machine.
Quotes.author: Caroline Rhea

Quotes.quote: Don’t worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.
Quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

Quotes.quote: Remember, today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday.
Quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

Quotes.quote: To err is human; to admit it, superhuman.
Quotes.author: Doug Larson

Quotes.quote: I'm in shape. Round is a shape.
Quotes.author: George Carlin

Quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Quotes.author: Aristotle

Quotes.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
Quotes.author: Maya Angelou

Quotes.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
Quotes.author: Babe Ruth

Quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
Quotes.author: Helen Keller

Quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
Quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

Quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

Quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
Quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

Quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
Quotes.author: Aesop

Quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
Quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

Quotes.quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.
Quotes.author: Democritus

Quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
Quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

Quotes.quote: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
Quotes.author: Amelia Barr
